name.description: Complete sequence for a two rakah prayer

stages.name: Opening Intention (Niyyah)
stages.arabic: نَوَيْتُ أُصَلِّي فَرْضَ الظُّهْرِ أَرْبَعَ رَكَعَاتٍ لِلهِ تَعَالَى
stages.transliteration: Nawaitu usalli fardal zuhri arba'a raka'atin lillahi ta'ala
stages.english: I intend to pray the obligatory Dhuhr prayer, four rak'at for Allah, the Exalted
stages.instruction: Make intention in heart, no need to say out loud

stages.name: Opening Takbeer
stages.instruction: Raise hands to ears and say while standing

stages.name: Opening Supplication (Istiftah)
stages.arabic: سُبْحَانَكَ اللَّهُمَّ وَبِحَمْدِكَ وَتَبَارَكَ اسْمُكَ وَتَعَالَى جَدُّكَ وَلاَ إِلَهَ غَيْرُكَ
stages.transliteration: Subhanaka Allahumma wa bihamdika wa tabarakasmuka wa ta'ala jadduka wa la ilaha ghairuk
stages.english: Glory be to You, O Allah, and praise. Blessed is Your name and exalted is Your majesty. There is no god but You

stages.name: Ta'awwudh
stages.english: I seek refuge in Allah from Satan, the accursed

stages.name: Surah Al-Fatiha
stages.arabic: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ ﴿١﴾ ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلْعَٰلَمِينَ ﴿٢﴾ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ ﴿٣﴾ مَٰلِكِ يَوْمِ ٱلدِّينِ ﴿٤﴾ إِيَّاكَ نَعْبُدُ وَإِيَّاكَ نَسْتَعِينُ ﴿٥﴾ ٱهْدِنَا ٱلصِّرَٰطَ ٱلْمُسْتَقِيمَ ﴿٦﴾ صِرَٰطَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَنْعَمْتَ عَلَيْهِمْ غَيْرِ ٱلْمَغْضُوبِ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا ٱلضَّآلِّينَ ﴿٧﴾

verses.english: In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful
All praise is due to Allah, Lord of the worlds
The Most Gracious, the Most Merciful
Master of the Day of Judgment
You alone we worship, and You alone we ask for help
Guide us to the straight path

verses.arabic: صِرَٰطَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَنْعَمْتَ عَلَيْهِمْ غَيْرِ ٱلْمَغْضُوبِ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا ٱلضَّآلِّينَ
verses.english: The path of those upon whom You have bestowed favor, not of those who have earned Your anger or of those who have gone astray

stages.name: Short Surah (Example: Al-Ikhlas)
stages.arabic: قُلْ هُوَ ٱللَّهُ أَحَدٌ ﴿١﴾ ٱللَّهُ ٱلصَّمَدُ ﴿٢﴾ لَمْ يَلِدْ وَلَمْ يُولَدْ ﴿٣﴾ وَلَمْ يَكُن لَّهُۥ كُفُوًا أَحَدٌۢ ﴿٤﴾

verses.english: He neither begets nor is born

verses.transliteration: Wa lam yakun lahu kufuwan ahad
verses.english: Nor is there to Him any equivalent

sequence.name: Takbeer before Ruku
sequence.instruction: Say while going down to bowing position

sequence.name: Ruku Dhikr
sequence.english: Glory be to my Lord, the Most Great

sequence.name: Rising Declaration
sequence.english: Allah hears those who praise Him

sequence.name: Standing Declaration
sequence.english: Our Lord, to You belongs all praise

sequence.name: Takbeer before Sujud
sequence.instruction: Say while going down to prostration

sequence.name: Sujud Dhikr
sequence.english: Glory be to my Lord, the Most High

stages.name: Final Sitting (Tashahhud)
stages.arabic: التَّحِيَّاتُ لِلَّهِ وَالصَّلَوَاتُ وَالطَّيِّبَاتُ، السَّلاَمُ عَلَيْكَ أَيُّهَا النَّبِيُّ وَرَحْمَةُ اللهِ وَبَرَكَاتُهُ، السَّلاَمُ عَلَيْنَا وَعَلَى عِبَادِ اللهِ الصَّالِحِينَ، أَشْهَدُ أَنْ لاَ إِلَهَ إِلاَّ اللهُ وَأَشْهَدُ أَنَّ مُحَمَّدًا عَبْدُهُ وَرَسُولُهُ
stages.transliteration: At-tahiyyatu lillahi was-salawatu wat-tayyibatu, as-salamu 'alayka ayyuhan-nabiyyu wa rahmatullahi wa barakatuh, as-salamu 'alayna wa 'ala 'ibadillahis-salihin, ash-hadu alla ilaha illallahu wa ash-hadu anna Muhammadan 'abduhu wa rasuluh
stages.english: All greetings, prayers and pure words are for Allah. Peace be upon you, O Prophet, and the mercy of Allah and His blessings. Peace be upon us and upon the righteous servants of Allah. I bear witness that there is no god but Allah, and I bear witness that Muhammad is His servant and messenger

sequence.name: Right Salam
sequence.english: Peace and mercy of Allah be upon you

sequence.name: Left Salam
sequence.english: Peace and mercy of Allah be upon you
